newsitem.title: USA: Candlewood Hotel takes over from franchisee.
newsitem.headline: Candlewood Hotel takes over from franchisee.

text.p: Candlewood Hotel Co Inc said Monday it has taken over the exclusive development rights for Northern California, Oregon and Washington from its franchisee, Studio West Hotel Development Co.

Candlewood said Studio West failed to meet a contractual obligation to submit three additional franchise applications by April 1. The company said Studio West had two Candlewood Hotels under construction and had signed three franchise agreements for three additional properties as of the end of 1996.
Candlewood is a owner, developer and franchiser of extended-stay hotels for business and other travelers.
